Name: Avelia Horizon Speed: 350km/h Model creation: 2018

History:

The Avelia Horizon is a high-speed train developed by the French multinational company Alstom. It was created in response to the need for efficient, eco-friendly, and high-capacity trains capable of meeting growing passenger demand in Europe. Here are some key details.

Facts:

The Avelia Horizon, introduced in 2018, is a high-speed, eco-friendly train designed to carry up to 740 passengers. Its aerodynamic design reduces energy consumption by 20%, while advanced braking and safety systems ensure smooth travel at speeds up to 350 km/h. Inside, it offers spacious, quiet, and accessible interiors.
